content:
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/59772

Hi @Pietro Albini in this ^^^ PR, we are having trouble getting mdbook-linkcheck to compile on the non-x86_64 builds because of a broken libssl dependency. But the thing is: we really only need to run linkcheck once (not on every platform). Is there a way to run the check only on a x86_64?
I'm too tired to think about a solution now :(
can you ping infra on that issue with the question?
Unfortunately, only org members can ping teams on github :/
I've added it to my queue and will try to take a look in the next few days
@simulacrum Thanks! Ping me if you need anything (Iâ€™m a bit more responsive if you ping me on github)
